comments.html:
I hope that the lesson learned for the team in question is "just stick to the Unicast Replication mode".

For those not entirely convinced, here's a link to a blog I wrote a few years back: https://telecomoccasionally.wordpress.com/2015/01/11/nsx-for-vsphere-vxlan-control-plane-modes-explained/

:)
comments.name: Dmitri Kalintsev

comments.html: I'm with Dmitri on this, but when customers do want to pursue the replication modes which use multicast, I point them to https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2365, and the need to plan their multicast address scopes / VNID pools carefully.
